lead_paragraph: Tech companies made the biggest gains, and oil prices rose for the second day in a row. But investors moved carefully, waiting for Friday’s jobs report.

headline.print_headline: On Eve of Jobs Report, Wall St. Ends Flat
headline.main: Wall St. Ends the Day Flat

snippet: Tech companies made the biggest gains, and oil prices rose for the second day in a row. But investors moved carefully, waiting for Friday’s jobs report....
abstract: Stocks end fairly flat ahead of jobs report.
